TEXT.TITLE: Honduras
TEXT.PARAGRAPH:
Honduras
Honduras Honduras itself _ it it itself that that itself the country the country itself which which itself
, officially the Republic of Honduras, often formerly known as Spanish Honduras, is a country in Central America, bordered to the west by Guatemala, to the southwest by El Salvador, to the southeast by Nicaragua, to the south by the Pacific Ocean and to the north by the Gulf of Honduras and the Caribbean Sea, with Belize (formerly British Honduras) situated 50 miles (75 km) away, across the Gulf of Honduras.
